properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 12:51PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in North Carolina...

Trent River At West of Trenton affecting Jones County

The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Trent River At West of Trenton.
* from this evening until further notice...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At12 PM Saturday the stage was 13.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this evening. Additional rises are
possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 14.0 feet...Farmland and fields are flooded along the
river. Water inundates the Trent River Campground.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive vehicles through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur
in automobiles when people try to drive through flooded areas.

Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Flood waters will
weaken the banks making them dangerous.

A followup product will be issued by the National Weather Service a
little later.
